boardgame.description: HeroQuest Advanced Quest Edition (also known by the German version name _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;HeroQuest Master Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;) is Milton Bradley's approach to a Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons-style adventure game. One player acts as game master, revealing the maze-like dungeon piecemeal as the players wander. Up to four other players take on a character (wizard, elf, dwarf or barbarian) and venture forth into dungeons on fantasy quests. Miniature plastic characters and doll-house style furniture make this game very approachable. Expansions were also released for this system._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The HeroQuest series consists of the main game and number of expansions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;HeroQuest Advanced Quest Edition adds 12 miniatures (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;black guards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;) with 4 kinds of detachable weapons and a new 13 part adventure _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The Dark Company_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; to the basic HeroQuest Box._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
